Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection Class Reference

Public Attributes

Detailed Description

An ODBC connection specialized for a Microsoft SQL Server. May be nested under Fragment, Module, Product.

Member Data Documentation

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Application

Optional application name.

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Database

Default database name.

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Id

Identifier for the connection (primary key).

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Instance

Optional name of the database instance.

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::IpAddress

IP address or host name of the database, default is "localhost".

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::NamedPipe

Optional named pipe for the database instance.

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Password

Optional password for SQL Server authentication.

integer Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Port

Database port, default is 1433.

complextype Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Protocol

Protocol to use One of Tcp, Np, Rpc, Np, Lpc, Spx, Vines, Adsp.

string Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::Username

Optional username for SQL Server authentication.

YesNoType Wix::Extensions::DataSource::MSSQLDatabaseConnection::WindowsAuthentication

Use Windows Authentication, ignore username and password.
